view.name: EAM_METRIC_PROB_VIEW
view.query: SELECT appdef_type, instance_id, measurement_id, timestamp, type FROM EAM_METRIC_PROB, EAM_MEASUREMENT m, EAM_MEASUREMENT_TEMPL t, EAM_MONITORABLE_TYPE mt WHERE measurement_id = m.id AND template_id = t.id AND monitorable_type_id = mt.id
